headline: Cloudflare's Architected to Stop the Biggest DDoS Attacks
keywords: DDoS, Attacks, Mitigation, Protection, DNS, Reliability, Bandwidth, Security
description: The last few weeks have seen several high-profile outages in legacy DNS and DDoS-mitigation services due to large scale attacks. Cloudflare's customers have, understandably, asked how we are positioned to handle similar attacks.
